Sentencas: CeO2-based redox nanomaterials are widely used in automotive catalysts, solid oxide fuel cell systems and many other applications as highly efficient redox systems.
Titulo: Self-assembly of one-pot synthesized CexZr1-xO2-BaO•nAl2O3 nanocomposites promoted by site-selective doping of alumina with barium

Sentencas: However, these properties suffer thermal deactivation under real operating conditions and accordingly thermal stability is a highly desirable property.
Titulo: Self-assembly of one-pot synthesized CexZr1-xO2-BaO•nAl2O3 nanocomposites promoted by site-selective doping of alumina with barium

Sentencas: We report that highly dispersed and intimately intermixed CeO2-ZrO2-BaO-Al2O3 nanocomposites can be synthesized by direct one-pot synthesis.
Titulo: Self-assembly of one-pot synthesized CexZr1-xO2-BaO•nAl2O3 nanocomposites promoted by site-selective doping of alumina with barium

Sentencas: With an appropriate choice of dopant concentration, a self-assembly mechanism is triggered on calcination at high temperatures to form a network of inter-grown stabilized transition aluminas and CexZr1-xO2 nanocrystals anchored over barium hexaaluminate which show remarkable catalytic properties and an excellent stability against thermal and redox ageing.
Titulo: Self-assembly of one-pot synthesized CexZr1-xO2-BaO•nAl2O3 nanocomposites promoted by site-selective doping of alumina with barium
